definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: People are doing their Christmas shopping.
sentences.chinese: 人們正在購買節日用品。

sentences.english: And the quality yet inexpensive consumer goods from China have been warmly received by the local people here.
sentences.chinese: 中國物美價廉的日用消費品，也深受當地人民的歡迎。

sentences.english: The utility model belongs to the electric heating electrical appliance of daily use industrial products.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型屬於一種電熱電器日用工業品。

sentences.english: Production of CNC Sample for home appliance, commodity, timekeeper and electronic product.
sentences.chinese: 家用電器，日用品，鐘錶電子產品手板製作。

sentences.english: Chaoan Jinmin Ceramic Factory is professional in producing daily-used porcelain.
sentences.chinese: 潮安縣集民陶瓷廠是一家專業生產日用陶瓷的廠家。

sentences.english: The community also provides bedding and other disposable daily necessities for guests.
sentences.chinese: 該社區還給客人提供牀上用品和其他一次性日用品。

sentences.english: New materials used in daily chemical industry were developed.
sentences.chinese: 爲我國日用化工開發了新的原料。

sentences.english: Blood and blood derivatives are considered a supply commodity or munition.
sentences.chinese: 血液和血液衍生品被認爲是日用品或軍需品。

sentences.english: Pottery utensils for daily use were chiefly made from refined terracotta and red sandy clay.
sentences.chinese: 日用陶器以細泥紅陶和夾砂紅褐陶爲主。

sentences.english: Our company year to year manages, daily use articles, cosmetics.
sentences.chinese: 我公司常年經營，日用百貨，化妝品。

sentences.english: They're a little-known commodity, I think, and little-understood.
sentences.chinese: 我想，它們是幾乎不爲人知也不爲人理解的日用品。

sentences.english: This import and export corporation deals in general merchandise , paper , lights , etc .
sentences.chinese: 這家進出口公司經營日用百貨，紙張，燈具等。

sentences.english: Chain dryer is a type of drying equipment mostly applied in domestic ceramic factories.
sentences.chinese: 鏈式乾燥機是日用陶瓷生產廠家常用的乾燥設備。

sentences.english: Sundry goods for daily use are availaBle at large retail and wholesale stores.
sentences.chinese: 日用雜品各大零售批發商店均有出售。

sentences.english: Manufacturers of fine quality down duvets and bed linens.
sentences.chinese: 高質量羽絨被和牀上日用品的生產商。

sentences.english: Our coated steel tubes can be widely used for home products and furniture.
sentences.chinese: 塑料包塑管可以廣泛用於日用品和家居設施等。

definition: generic term for cotton or kapok/cotton/padded or quilted with cotton
